review.author: DevOps (Codex)
findings: APPROVED — Slice 3 Phase B: IPC handlers + CLI script + seed migration + tests.
12 new memory IPC channels correctly wire to memory module methods. All parameter shapes verified.
hm-memory.js CLI follows established WebSocket pattern (requestId matching, response envelope handling).
Seed migration provably idempotent via deterministic SHA-1 IDs + UNIQUE constraint conflict handling.
Category mapping correct: important_notes→directive, completed→completion, roadmap+not_yet_done→roadmap, known_issues→issue, architecture→architecture.
Integration test covers full IPC round-trip: session start → 5 decisions → get-context → verify assembled shape.
Cross-model (Gemini): IPC wiring verified. CLI pattern consistent. Seed idempotency confirmed. No issues.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
